code: import React,{useState}from'react';import HistoriaClinicaForm from'../components/HistoriaClinicaForm';import{Container,ListGroup,Button}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HistoriaClinicaPage=()=>{const[historias,setHistorias]=useState([]);const[editingHistoria,setEditingHistoria]=useState(null);const addHistoria=historia=>{setHistorias([...historias,historia]);setEditingHistoria(null);};const deleteHistoria=index=>{setHistorias(historias.filter((_,i)=>i!==index));};const editHistoria=index=>{setEditingHistoria({...historias[index],index});};const handleSave=historia=>{if(editingHistoria){const updatedHistorias=historias.map((h,i)=>i===editingHistoria.index?historia:h);setHistorias(updatedHistorias);setEditingHistoria(null);}else{addHistoria(historia);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Gesti\xF3n de Historias Cl\xEDnicas"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HistoriaClinicaForm,{historia:editingHistoria,onSave:handleSave}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListGroup,{children:historias.map((historia,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListGroup.Item,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:historia.fecha}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:historia.descripcion}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:historia.diagnostico}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"warning",onClick:()=>editHistoria(index),children:"Editar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"danger",onClick:()=>deleteHistoria(index),children:"Eliminar"})]},index))})]});};export default HistoriaClinicaPage;
